event.title: I Love Free Software Day @ Internet Archive Europe in Amsterdam, Netherlands

body.p: Come and enjoy a simultaneous Dutch and English book reading of Ada & Zangemann, a tale for kids (and adults) about the importance of hacking and open technologies. After the reading, we will have a more topical round-table about Free Software maintenance as care work, together with Mayel de Borniol from Bonfire, a modular Fediverse project co-designed with communities.
Come and join us for the celebration of the "I Love Free Software Day" together with the Internet Archive Europe! When? On the 14. February 2026 from 14:00 to 17:00 (local time!)
